definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: And Vergeer admits that "sometimes it's tiring always trying to improve.
sentences.chinese: 沃吉尔承认，“有时会对无尽的提高而感到厌烦。”

sentences.english: Shawn boomed. "There is endless bounty there for both of us.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩低声说，“那儿会给我们俩无尽的礼物。

sentences.english: So the number of types of aioli is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 因此蒜泥蛋黄酱的种类将是无穷无尽的。

sentences.english: There'll be green waves forever out there waiting for me.
sentences.chinese: 在那，永恒无尽的绿浪，正等待着我。

sentences.english: I declare that the Library is endless.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，这座图书馆是无穷无尽的。

sentences.english: It is where yugoloths cavort on endless volcanic slopes .
sentences.chinese: 在那里尤哥罗斯魔活跃于无尽的火山斜坡之上。

sentences.english: That year, we have met, but poly endless period.
sentences.chinese: 那年，我们曾相遇，可是聚无尽期。

sentences.english: My little crew of friends enjoyed no end of sex.
sentences.chinese: 我的一帮朋友在享受着无尽的性福时光。

sentences.english: I would like to express our gratitude on behalf of the Kindergarten for your patronage.
sentences.chinese: 仅此向你表达我校仝人无尽的谢意。

sentences.english: Crisscrossing the skyline are streams of unending repulsorlift traffic.
sentences.chinese: 在天边来往交错的是无尽的反重力交通流。

sentences.english: Open pits evolved into networks of underground galleries.
sentences.chinese: 露天的矿坑也逐渐演变成这地下无尽的隧道网。

sentences.english: Areas like Kabukicho offer an endless choice of nightlifedestinations.
sentences.chinese: 像歌舞伎町这样的地方为夜生活的提供了无尽的选择。

sentences.english: Are we not straying, as through an infinite nothing?
sentences.chinese: 在这无尽的虚无中，我们没迷路么？

sentences.english: The grassland stretched beyond what the human eye could see.
sentences.chinese: 绵延无尽的草原，一眼望不到边。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
